alert.note: Alert for Weber (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 9:32PM MDT until further notice by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Utah... Bear River At Corinne affecting Box Elder County. South Fork of The Ogden River Near Huntsville affecting Weber County. Sevier River Near Hatch affecting Piute, Garfield, Iron, Kane and Sevier Counties. .Snowmelt due to warm temperatures and upstream dam releases will continue to result in increased river flows. Minor flooding is ongoing and will continue along the South Fork of the Ogden River near Huntsville, and along the Bear River near Corinne. For the Sevier River...including Hatch...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork of The Ogden River Near Huntsville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.6 feet, low lying areas near the banks of the South Fork of the Ogden River below Causey Reservoir through the town of Huntsville will receive minor flooding. At 5.5 feet, low lying areas adjacent to the South Fork of the Ogden River below Causey Reservoir through the town of Huntsville will receive moderate flood damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM MDT Tuesday the stage was 4.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM MDT Tuesday was 4.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is forecast to remain above flood stage until further notice. - Flood stage is 4.6 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday at 1200 PM MDT.
